Eric J Dunphy

Charleston, SC · (843) 823-2515 · e@ericjdunphy.com

I am a technical analyst with experience as a skilled manager of business operations, technical products, and development teams, who leads with strong analytical skills and excellent inter-personal instincts. I am a self-motivated team player and my experience has delivered measurable results in Healthcare Information Services, and I will continue to make a positive impact in any diverse, outcome-driven organization.

Interests

Apart from being a Analyst, I enjoy most of my time with friends and family. During the summer, you'll see me at the beach or on a boat most weekends. During the other months, I'll be biking or walking around Charleston with my wife and dog. On rainy days and time to myself, I enjoy spending time cooking, playing amateur chef and mixologist, and playing disc golf.

In 2015, I moved to Charleston after 32 years of living in the northeast.
